about_the_game:
Become the notorious getaway driver, dodging through destructible cityscapes inspired by real-world locations, rendered in a unique retro hand-drawn style. Your goal? Escape the relentless pursuit of cops, SWAT teams, helicopters, tanks, missiles, and even paratroopers!
You are now the public enemy
Will you be able to survive the rampage?



Features:
-Escape epic cop chases and become the most wanted heist driver



-Unlock legendary vehicles
-Find and craft weapons and power-ups to enhance your car and firepower
-Rob banks and survive against police units, SWAT , helicopters, military tanks, airstrikes jeeps, , missiles , paratroopers and more.



-From the streets of Italy to the pyramids of Egypt, embark on daring heists worldwide.
-Evade law enforcement through sprawling, free-roaming maps ripe for action-packed drifting and racing.

Can you outrun the law and cement your status as the ultimate heist driver? The world of high-stakes crime awaits—will you make it out alive?

short_description: Get ready for high-octane chaos in Heistfest, the ultimate arcade game where you live life on the wrong side of the law. This black and white adventure pits you against increasingly ruthless law enforcement as you mastermind daring bank heists and fight for your survival!
